description:
In this course i will be showing you how to install windows 3.1 , windows xp , windows 7 , windows 8.1 and windows server 2012 .Â 

In this course , you will learn how to install :

  • Windows 3.1
  • Windows XP Service Pack 1
  • Windows 7
  • Windows 8.1
  • Windows Server 2012.

We are using virtual box but you can use real machines to install this windows .
title: Installation - Operating System
